page.title: 18RECREATION, LYNEMOUTH.
page.content: {School.cont'd. {Brownies.} Another group which uses the school as their base is the local Brownie-Pack.This is a thriving group of twenty-four girls who are provided with an interesting and varied programme of activities.Because of the demand, a Girl-Guide group is being contemplated. {Brass-Band. In common with many mining areas there is a local Brass-Band. This is made up of people from the immediate locality as well as from much further afield.The band includes many young people,some barely teenagers. As with the Garden-Shows,rivalry amongst Bands is high and consequently Band conductors are engaged from both near and far.An annual Band-Contest is held as part of the Miner's Gala.
